name: Ground Divers!
overview: An all-new strategic digging roguelike experience! Tactics, crafting, and support are the key to tackling the underground! Featuring mech designs by Shigeto Koyama, character designs by Kakeru Kakemaru, and a theme song by Hironobu Kageyama! Enjoy engaging strategy in a charming game world! Plough your way through 7 stages with great replayability, and dig up the unexplored secrets of rare matter!
